Columns.Name: Sales Organisation
Columns.Description: Company or Unit Identifier/Description

Columns.Name: Distribution Channel
Columns.Description: Distribution channel in terms of the sales organization - Digital or stores

Columns.Name: Store ID
Columns.Description: Unique Store ID

Columns.Name: Competitor Store ID
Columns.Description: Unique Store ID for the Competitor Store

Columns.Name: Competitor Code
Columns.Description: Unique Competitior Identifier

Columns.Name: Competitor Name
Columns.Description: Name of the Competitor

Columns.Name: Merch level ID
Columns.Description: Merch Level Identifier

Columns.Name: Competitor Store Zipcode
Columns.Description: Zip code of the competitor store

Columns.Name: Competitor Store State
Columns.Description: State in which the competitor store

Columns.Name: Competitor Store City
Columns.Description: City of the competitor store

Columns.Name: Competitor Store District
Columns.Description: District of the competitor store

Columns.Name: Competitor Status
Columns.Description: Represents the status of the competitor store as open/closed etc

Columns.Name: Competitor Radius
Columns.Description: Represents the radius for which the competitor data is available. Ex: 1-mile radius, 3-mile radius

Columns.Name: Competition Intensity
Columns.Description: A value between 1 - 10, 10 being extremely competitive

Columns.Name: Competitor Store Distance
Columns.Description: Distance between the corresponding store and competitor store

Columns.Name: Parking size
Columns.Description: The size of the parking space in the store denotes as big, medium and small {Competitor Store}

Columns.Name: Cafe
Columns.Description: Y/N to denote if the store has a caf√© {Competitor Store}

Columns.Name: Kid zone
Columns.Description: Y/N to denote availability of kid zone in the store {Competitor Store}

Columns.Name: Activity zone
Columns.Description: Y/N to denote availability of activity area in the store {Competitor Store}

Columns.Name: Store In Store
Columns.Description: Y/N to denote if there is store within the store {Competitor Store}

Columns.Name: Competitor characteristic 1
Columns.Description: If additional information is available, these fields can be used to store that info

Columns.Name: Competitor characteristic 2
Columns.Description: If additional information is available, these fields can be used to store that info
